name: One Arrow Rampage
description:
You're the finest archer in the kingdom, part of the most elite squad handpicked by the king. One day the king decided you were no longer of any use to him, so he sent the rest of your squad to murder your family and kill you as well.

You survived the assassination attempt, but your family didn't. Now you're going to take revenge on your former comrades.

They confiscated your weapons so you only have a bow, some rope, and one arrow, but that's all you need.

Currently at v1.0
Made for the Godot Wild Jam #21
Theme: Connection

Wildcards used:

Instructions
  • WASD to move
  • W or Space bar to jump
  • Left click to attack, in direction of mouse
  • Right click to launch grapple, in direction of mouse
Credits
  • Programming by Efigi
  • SFX by Janusz
  • Background image by edurmunizz
  • Characters and props by OcO
  • Pixel Heart by DontMind8
  • Emotes by KenneyNL
  • Crosshair by Donut Studio
